Pre-Game Insights: Kyrie Irving is expected to lead the Mavericks against his former team.
Kyrie has averaged 28.2 points per game against the Cavaliers over the past few seasons and is likely to exceed 26.5 points in this game.
The Cavaliers have been susceptible to opponent point guard scoring, having given up big games to players like Austin Reaves, Jamal Murray, Collin Sexton, and Tyrese Maxey.
